text: 2:4 Esekiel 28:2; Daniel 7:25; 11:36; 1 Korin 8:5; Akar Mogomem 13:6Bizir gumazamiziba ziaba feba ko dar bora ghaze men godba o men aseba, a dar apanimɨn ikiam. Egh a uabɨra uan ziam fɨva egh a bizir kaba bar da dɨkabɨragham. Egh a Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven daperagh ikɨva kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Kɨ uabɨra God.”
